addr: 6655 Santa Monica Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90038
title: Goodbye Circus Disco: Under The Big Top
desc: After 40+ years, LA?s legendary Circus Disco will be closing its doors soon. The producers of Momentum invite you to join us as we return for one final time Under the Big Top as the circuit says Goodbye to Circus Disco.? THANKSGIVING SATURDAY Nov 28th 10PM-4AM, 21+ Circus Disco 6655 Santa Monica Blvd, Hollywood Music for this historic night will be provided by one of dance music?s most successful producers, 2-time Grammy Nominee TONY MORAN, along with LA?s own superstar tribal house producer ALEXANDER, returning one final time to his first LA club residency at Circus Disco. Don?t miss this final chance to dance to your favorite circuit anthems at one of Hollywood?s most treasured venues. Celebrate the club? that has given the LGBTQ community over 40 years of fond memories as one of the nation?s longest running and most groundbreaking venues. Featuring all the classic Circus Disco lighting, reinforced with world-famous FUNKTION-ONE sound plus two 10-watt full color laser light shows, just for this special event. Please share this with all your friends and join us as the circuit comes together to bid farewell to this landmark venue so many of us have called home. Produced by Momentum's 360haus and Ray & Dante Save with advance tickets available online. Tickets will also be available at the door.
